original: <color_white>The Coolest Watch You've NEVER SEEN</color>™\n\nThis is undoubtedly the coolest looking watch you've ever seen before.  Its like something from a sci-fi TV show or a video game.  Its bands are a rich crimson-red leather on the outside and soft sheepskin on the inside, with a sturdy gold clasp on the end of one band and seven beautifully punctured holes at precise intervals on the other band.  Its body is a uniform  black disk with a nearly invisible compartment in the back for batteries.  Its glass faceplate functions as a button which calls forth the most user-friendly interface you've ever used describing all of its numerous functions all conveyed by an silly animated Magic-8 Ball that's saying <color_light_green>'No internet signal found.  Note: Lambda Protocol is active.  Go Team Zenture!'</color>
translation: <color_white>你从未见过的最酷手表</color>™\n\n这无疑是你见过的最酷的手表。就像是科幻电视剧或电子游戏里的东西。它的绑带由深红色皮革包裹柔软的羊皮制成，其中一个绑带末端有一个结实的金扣，另一个则精准而均匀地分部者七个漂亮的穿孔。它的主体是一个制式的黑色磁盘，背部一个几乎看不到的隔间内藏着电池。它的玻璃面板具有触屏功能，发出了你曾经使用过的最友好的界面，描述它的所有功能，所有这些功能都是由一个看起来很愚蠢的魔力8号球通过动画传达的，上面写着<color_light_green>“没有找到互联网信号”。注意：Lambda协议处于活跃状态。请联系Zenture团队！</color>
context:
ID: dkz_zenture_industries_premium_zwatch

类型为 TOOL_ARMOR

original: A breathtaking, seven meter tall, metallic creature stands atop three long legs, with many more segmented tentacles emanating from its central chassis and a glowing halo about its head.  This one is far more terrifying though, its claim to fame being some sort of high-intensity energy cannon, capable of rending whatever it touches asunder in an explosive burst of plasma and flame.  Its unique chirping and booming footsteps often heralded trouble to come during the Arrival, and now is no different.
translation: 就像所有的使徒机器人一样，这只令人惊叹的金属怪物靠三条长长的腿支撑着身体，而还有更多分段的触角从中央底盘上伸出，头顶还有一个发光的光环。然而，这个型号比同类要可怕得多，它的成名之举是底盘上安装的某种高能激光炮，能够在等离子爆炸和火焰中撕碎任何接触到的东西。它独特的蜂鸣声和隆隆的脚步声在降临之日时预示着大麻烦的到来，即便时至今日也依旧如此。

original: A colossal eight meter tall, chrome-metallic creature standing atop three long legs connected to a central chassis.  It would be stunningly beautiful with its glowing golden inlays and celestial design, were it not for the evil-looking ray-gun on its tentacle-mounted turrets which survey the landscape with surgical focus.  It drums ominously as it moves and booming foot falls are often the last sound heard before it strikes.
translation: 一台高耸入云、有几层楼高的金属怪物，通过连接在中央底盘的三条带有分段的长腿支撑。如果不是它触手上安装着看起来很邪恶的激光枪，用外科手术的焦点观察风景的话，它身上那些闪闪发光的金色符文和精妙流体设计会使它看上去美丽惊人。它移动发出隆隆的脚步在你耳边萦绕回荡，那往往是在它发起撞击前能听到的最后声音。

original: A skittering, multi-legged creature that appears to be made of a chunk of crystal about the size of a baseball.  It skitters around on wire-like legs, eating bits of organic leftovers to gain mass in hopes of one day seeding a crystal colony of its own.
translation: 一种跳跃的多足动物，看起来像是由一块棒球大小的水晶做成的。它像电线一样的腿在地上蹦蹦跳跳，吃一些有机剩菜来获得质量，希望有一天能种下自己的水晶菌落。

original: A sleek mass of dozens of thin metallic tentacles which originate from a metallic core that looks like a mix between a garbage disposal and a clamp, with golden pinpoints of dim light dotting its chassis.  It seems adept at collecting small pieces of junk and debris and mulching them in its mouth for unknown purposes - you included.
translation: 一堆光滑的细金属触手，源自一个金属核心，看起来像是垃圾处理和夹子的混合物，它的底盘上点缀着暗淡的金色光点。它似乎善于收集小块垃圾和碎片——包括你的身体，并将它们覆盖在嘴里，用于未知的目的。
context:

original: A sleek, white-plated spherical robot about the size of a soccer ball, with a prominent golden insignia of a stylized sun being pierced with a flaming sword.  Capable of effortless flight, it hovers about the ruins of the former world; irregularly placed integrated cameras and high-intensity spotlights dispassionately bear witness to the chaos around it.  Who knows what might be watching on the other side…
translation: 一个光滑的，白色镀金的球形机器人，大约足球大小，有一个突出的金色徽章，标志着一个被燃烧的剑刺穿的太阳。它能够毫不费力地飞行，在前世界的废墟上盘旋；不规则放置的集成摄像头和高强度聚光灯冷静地见证了周围的混乱。谁知道另一边可能在看什么…

original: A slim reptoid about the size of a big dog, with a thick mane of what looks like rather pretty orange-blue 'feathers' around its head.  Frond-like protrusions grow from the top of its head down to the base of its tail, glowing faintly when in the presence of other members of its pack.
translation: 一种体型和一只大狗差不多大的瘦小的爬行动物，头上长着浓密的橘蓝色“羽毛”一般的鬃毛。蕨叶状的突触从头长到尾，当它和族群里的其他成员一同出现时，上面会发出微弱的光。

It is most commonly found around floating around flowers, fruits, and other sugary substances in small, communal groups.  It regards you with curiosity, and occasionally flashes its markings as if it is communicating among its fellows.

It seems to watch you closely…

original: A suit of light-weight, roughly human-sized armor once belonged the xenoids.  Its terribly damaged from some combination of the combat its seen, the process needed to pry it off its wearer, and some sort of dead man's switch on the elements that actually power the thing and make it easy to wear.  There are very faintly visible alien hieroglyphs scattered across the armor.  There isn't anything to stop you from trying it on for size if you wanted to.
translation: 一套轻量的，大致人大小的盔甲曾经属于异族人。它在战斗中受到了严重的破坏，需要把它从佩戴者身上撬开，还有一些失能开关，这些都是给它提供动力并使它易于佩戴的因素。盔甲上散布着非常隐约可见的外星象形文字。没有什么能阻止你试穿它，如果你想的话。

Complements to the vanilla adding the vile Xenoids, the murderous Strays, and terrifying [REDACTED], and more!  <color_light_red>Prepare for a challenge.</color>
translation: 一个补充mod，增加了一支神秘外星类人军事组织的远征部队到经典生存场景以提高游戏体验。作为原版的补充，加入了邪恶的异族生物、凶残的迷失者和可怕的[节选修订]等等！<color_light_red>准备迎接挑战。</color>

original: A towering mass of blue-purple crystal chunks covered in small, fist-sized holes, from which drips a disgusting, faintly glowing rock slurry - perhaps a nutrient mix for its young.  After all, it seems to subtly pulsate, as if more organic than its mineral appearance would suggest.  The air around it perpetually crackles with palpable energy and menaces with a set of thick, meaty tendrils with razor-like barbs, with something else just as unseemly writhing just beneath the murky surface of the glassy 'rocks'.
translation: 一大块高高耸立的蓝紫色水晶，上面覆盖着拳头大小的小孔，从这些小孔中滴下一种令人作呕的、微微发光的岩石泥浆——也许是它幼崽的营养混合物。毕竟，它似乎在微妙地跳动，似乎比它的矿物外观所显示的更有机。它周围的空气不断地噼啪作响，带有明显的能量和威胁，有一套厚厚的、肉质的卷须和剃刀一样的倒刺，还有一些东西在黑暗的玻璃“岩石”表面下不体面地扭动着。

original: A towering, seven meter tall, metallic creature standing atop three long legs connected to a central chassis.  It would be stunningly beautiful with its glowing golden inlays and celestial design, were it not for the gas that pours from its tentacle-mounted guns that despoils the landscape and makes your skin prickle just looking at its toxic, likely radioactive, glory.  Its hums hauntingly as it moves and booming footsteps often heralded trouble to come since the arrival of the xenoids, now is no different.
translation: 一种高大的、七米高的金属生物，站在与中央底盘相连的三条长腿上。如果不是因为触手上的枪喷出的气体，破坏了景观，让你的皮肤刺痛，仅仅是看着它有毒的，可能是放射性的荣耀，它的金色镶嵌和天体设计将是惊人的美丽。它移动时发出的嗡嗡声和隆隆的脚步声常常预示着麻烦的到来，因为色狼的到来，现在也不例外。

original: After partially melting the xenoid face mask to remove the alien metal and replacing it with steel, applying an entire kevlar panel, and painting it white, the once unnerving alien face now more or less resembles an average hockey mask, while preserving the alien optics, the gas-proofing, and removing the radioactivity.

Yet despite it's fearsome appearance, has a strangely musical voice, marking it as something more than human.

original: Lithe muscle and pulsating crystal fused together into a mass that must be made up of multiple bodies, propelled forward by multiple grossly elongated crystal limbs sharpened to dangerous points.  It strides about the streets, spearing intruders to its domain like some sort of horrid spider from beyond the stars.
translation: 柔软的肌肉和跳动的水晶融合成一团，必须由多个身体组成，由多个严重拉长的水晶肢体推动，尖锐到危险点。它在街道上大步前进，像某种可怕的蜘蛛一样，从天上射来入侵者。

original: Little more than a moving mound of crystal and meat that occasionally spits up a tide of glowing, rocky gruel from its many cracks and crevices, this crab-like creature trudges to and fro bearing a heavy burden.  From just behind the murky surfaces of its shell, you can almost make out small, moving creatures skittering about in its complex innards.  It seems to stay close to other crystal creatures, pouring the blue-goop it secretes onto them like some sort of caretaker.  When threatened it is capable of producing harrowing screams, no doubt drawing its friends to its aide.
translation: 这个像螃蟹一样的生物背负着沉重的负担，来回跋涉着，只不过是一堆移动着的水晶和肉，偶尔从它的许多裂缝和缝隙里吐出一股炽热的岩石粥。从它的壳的阴暗表面后面，你几乎可以辨认出在它复杂的内脏里蹦蹦跳跳的小动物。它似乎和其他水晶生物保持着密切的联系，像某种看门人一样把它分泌的蓝色粘液倒在它们身上。当受到威胁时，它会发出令人痛心的尖叫声，毫无疑问会把它的朋友们引向它的助手。

original: This is the iconic canadian action figure, Clark the Nark. He comes with a felt prison jumpsuit, a plastic moneybag, a plastic gun and a plastic cell phone. The lackey of the notorious Thieving Stephen, his plot always involved selling out Stephen as soon as it looked like they were going to get caught and escaping. However, he always redems himself in his bosses eyes by breaking him out of prison. The most versitile of the villians, it's sad they didn't include any of his disguises.
translation: 这是标志性的加拿大动作人物，纳克克拉克。他带着一件毡服，一个塑料钱袋，一把塑料枪和一部塑料手机。作为臭名昭著的偷盗者斯蒂芬的走狗，他的阴谋总是在斯蒂芬看起来要被抓住逃跑时就把他卖了。然而，在老板眼里，他总是把自己从监狱里救了出来。维利亚人中最多变的，很遗憾他们没有他的任何伪装。

original: This is the iconic canadian action figure, Mounty Jane. original: This strangely human face mask is like the portrait of a monster from the deepest parts of the uncanny valley.  While there is no visible eye holes on the exterior, on the inner side of the mask there are two crystal clear portholes that unnaturally distort the light coming through.  There is also a vent-like grid on the lower part which allows air to pass.  The various straps on the back can be adjusted which in turn changes the size and shape of the mask itself, twisting the face into new and uniquely monstrous expressions.
translation: 这个奇怪的人类面具就像是来自神秘山谷最深处的怪物的肖像。虽然在面具的外部没有可见的眼孔，但在面具的内侧有两个水晶般透明的舷窗，不自然地扭曲了通过的光线。下部还有一个类似通风口的格栅，可以让空气通过。背面的各种带子可以调整，进而改变面具本身的大小和形状，将脸部扭曲成新的、独特的怪异表情。

original: I only know what I've heard on the radio. Thank god we haven't had them show up here they sound almost scarier than the walking dead. I've heard that those 'Xenoids' have also have some robotic drones and machines with them but I haven't seen anything yet. There was a pale looking guy with a mohawk that was pestering me about them, but but I think he's working on the old generator now.
translation: 我只知道我从收音机里听到的东西。感谢上帝他们没有出现在这儿，那些家伙听起来比丧尸更吓人。我听说那些“异种”还带着一些无人机和机器，但我还没看到过那些东西。有个白脸的留莫西干头的家伙缠着我问过他们，我想他这会儿去修旧发电机了。

original: When I was on the evacuation bus I saw a group of these strange looking soldier types that were armed with swords and shields. I almost thought it was some kind of morbid live action role playing during the riots, until one of them looked directly at me.  I swear its eyes pulsed red, and I started having the worst panic attack I've ever had, it was as if the knight turned into a crusading Templar and I was a refugee outside the walls of Jerusalem.  If I hadn't already had an empty stomach I probably would have lost it.  It still haunts me.
translation: 当时我在疏散巴士上，我看到一群长相奇怪的士兵一样的家伙，他们拿着刀剑和盾牌。我还以为这是暴乱期间某些疯子搞的角色扮演呢，直到其中一个“人”瞪了我一眼。我发誓，它的眼睛闪着红光。然后我经历了这辈子最严重的一次恐慌症发作，就好像骑士变成了十字军东征军，而我是耶路撒冷城墙外的难民。要不是我肚子空空的话，我当时怕是会屎尿横流了。这事儿想起来就吓人。

original: When I was scouting the spire where the aliens took Barry, I saw these other strange humanoid soldiers armed with swords and shields attack the aliens that took Barry.  I thought I might be able to sneak in and rescue Barry, but one of the soldiers fired a trio of metal darts at me.  Luckily it missed but I didnt' stick around after that.
translation: 当时我在侦察外星人带走巴里的尖塔，我看到这些拿着剑和盾牌的奇怪人形士兵攻击带走巴里的外星人。我想着我可以趁机溜进去救巴里，但其中一个士兵朝我发射了三枚金属飞镖。幸好没打中，然后我就赶紧跑了。

original: A small, fist sized critter that looks like a floating slug covered in bio-luminescent markings, capable of limited flight through utilization of membranous, wing-like protrusions and the secretion of a faint white mist.  It is most commonly found around floating around dead leaves, rotten fruits, and other substances in small, communal groups.  It regards you with curiosity, and occasionally flashes its markings as if it is communicating among its fellows.

original: The steadfastness of individual survivors after the cataclysm impressed the tattered remains of the once glorious union.  Spurred on by small successes, a number of operations to re-secure facilities met with limited success.  Forced to eventually consolidate to large bases, the Old Guard left these facilities in the hands of the few survivors that remained.  As the years passed, little materialized from the hopes of rebuilding civilization…
translation: 一个个灾变幸存者们的坚定不移的精神打动了曾经辉煌联邦的些许残存组织。因数次任务成功所鼓舞而展开的一系列夺回其他设施的行动却成果有限。旧日守护者们最终不得不将有限的资源集中到更大的基地中去，将已夺回的设施交给剩余的少数幸存者管理。年复一年，重建人类文明的希望却始终渺茫……

original: All I can say is that when I saw his eyes pulse red and the whole world around me changed.  The aliens with swords now appeared like armoured knights with a golden cross on the shield.  The strangest thing is that I never really paid attention to history in school, but I knew they were Knights Templar coming to kill us.  Just when they seemed like they were about to strike, I must have came to my senses because I was on the floor of the bus dry heaving.
translation: 我能说的就是当我看到他的眼睛红红的，我周围的整个世界都变了。带着剑的外星人现在看起来像盔甲骑士，盾牌上有一个金色的十字架。最奇怪的是，我在学校从来没有真正关注过历史，但我知道他们是圣殿骑士来杀我们的。就在他们似乎要罢工的时候，我一定是清醒过来了，因为我当时在公共汽车的地板上干得喘不过气来。

original: I was trying to get in contact with the rest of my family because I'd figure that if anyone would be fighting alien invaders it would be my uncle.  But when it came down to it I ended using my last full magazine to drop half a dozen strays a pair of xenoids that were about to kill me.  Then, I ran here as quick as my feet could carry me and now I'm stuck here in the ruins of this public school, doing the best I can to help these guys keep the lights on.  I could probably rendezvous with my family if I wanted, but I want to make sure these people here are safe before I'd even consider leaving this place.  The people are here are nice and this place kind of grows on you.
translation: 我试图与我的家人取得联系，因为我想如果有人要与外星入侵者作战，那就是我叔叔。但最终，我用最后一本完整的杂志扔掉了半打迷路的东西——一对即将杀死我的氙。然后，我飞快地跑来这里，现在我被困在这所公立学校的废墟中，尽我所能帮助这些人开灯。如果我想要的话，我可能会和家人团聚，但我想确保这些人在我考虑离开这个地方之前是安全的。这里的人都很好，这个地方对你有点吸引力。

original: I was trying to get in contact with the rest of my family because I'd figure that if anyone would be fighting alien invaders it would be my uncle.  But when it came down to it I ended using my last full magazine to drop half a dozen strays a pair of xenoids that were about to kill me.  Then, I ran here as quick as my feet could carry me and now I'm stuck here in the 0ruins of this public school, doing the best I can to help these guys keep the lights on.  I could probably rendezvous with my family if I wanted, but I want to make sure these people here are safe before I'd even consider leaving this place.  The people are here are nice and this place kind of grows on you.
translation: 我试图与我的家人取得联系，因为我想如果有人要与外星人作战，那一定是我叔叔。但归根结底，我用我最后一本完整的杂志扔了半打迷路的东西，一对快要杀了我的异族人。然后，我以我的双脚所能支撑的最快速度跑到这里，现在我被困在这所公立学校的废墟中，尽我所能帮助这些人保持灯亮。如果我想的话，我可能会和我的家人见面，但我想在我考虑离开这里之前确保这里的人安全。这里的人都很好，这个地方对你有点吸引力。

original: Its a funny story about a Mexican cartel drug front, a CIA Honeypot, an FBI Reco case, and the Library of Congress's newspaper archives.  The Cartel was trying to launder their drug and human trafficking money by building a large indoor go-cart race track.  Somehow the CIA had an agent within the that specific cartel and were able to influence the cartel to invest far more money than they should have, after which the FBI collected all the bad guys they had this building practically ready to open.  The FBI ended up giving most of the floors to the Library of Congress to store newspapers, and some of the other usual suspects took their share too.  Once this cataclysm happened and much of the government was destroyed, this site was commandeered to coordinate local responses against the Xenoids.
translation: 这是一个关于墨西哥贩毒集团的有趣故事，一个中情局蜜罐，一个FBI记录案件，还有国会图书馆的报纸档案。该卡特尔试图通过建造一个大型室内手推车赛道来清洗他们的毒品和人口贩运资金。不知何故，中央情报局在该特定卡特尔的内部有一名特工，能够影响该卡特尔投资比他们本应投资的多得多的资金，此后，联邦调查局收集了所有坏人，这座大楼实际上已经准备好开放。FBI最终将大部分楼层让给了国会图书馆来存放报纸，其他一些常见的嫌疑人也拿走了他们的一份。一旦这场大灾难发生，政府的大部分被摧毁，这个地方就被征用来协调当地对异族人的反应。
context:

original: So my uncle, Chad Erikson, was the guy who got my this cool watch, but since this cataclysm started the internet went down globally all I have is the built in games.  I still try to refresh the connection and see if I can find any transient satellites or another a random link to anything left online.  This morning when I woke up I had noticed that MY watch had been pinged by someone that I am sure is my uncle Chad. I have a good idea of where he is at, I give you the direction and how far away it is, but other than that I can only guess.
translation: 我叔叔查德·埃里克森是我这只酷酷手表的获得者，但自从这场大灾难开始，互联网在全球范围内衰落，我所拥有的只是内置游戏。我仍在尝试刷新连接，看看是否能找到任何暂时的卫星或其他随机链接。今天早上当我醒来时，我注意到我的手表被一个我确信是我叔叔查德的人敲响了。我很清楚他在哪里，我给你方向和距离，但除此之外我只能猜测。

There have been rumors of other types haven't been encountered yet.

original: We don't exactly know what they are or how exactly they relate to the rest this cataclysm that has been happening.  From their tactics we can assume that the Xenoids are operating as a sort of paramilitary or an expeditionary force. They seem to favor melee weapons and shield rather than long range firearms, however they also are able to fire short range flechette darts.  As if that was bad enough these aliens have some mind-affecting abilities that I cannot explain at all.  Having said all that they are not immortal, we can make them bleed so we can make them die.
translation: 我们不知道它们到底是什么，也不知道它们与正在发生的这场灾难的其余部分有什么关系。根据他们的战术，我们可以假设，异族人是作为一种准军事或远征部队行动的。他们似乎更喜欢近战武器和盾牌，而不是远程火器，不过他们也能发射短程飞镖。好像这已经够糟糕了，这些外星人有一些影响思维的能力，我根本无法解释。说了这么多，他们不是不朽的，我们可以让他们流血，这样我们就可以让他们死去。

original: We know of two types of Xenoid drones, reconnaissance and seeker drones.  Seeker drones do just that, seek out enemies and engage them.  Reconnaissance drones won't engage in combat unless cornered and if they are engaged they flee as quickly as possible.  Both types of drones are capable of emitting a bright light and temporarily blinding you, but seeker drones can also taze you.
translation: 我们知道有两种氙气无人机，侦察无人机和寻的无人机。探索者无人机就是这样做的，寻找敌人并与他们交战。侦察无人机除非被逼入绝境，否则不会参与战斗，如果他们参与战斗，他们会尽快逃离。这两种类型的无人机都能发出亮光并暂时致盲，但探索者无人机也能让你晕眩。
